precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over an empty area of the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu labeled "Arrange Icons By" will appear, displaying options such as "Refresh," "Paste," "Paste Shortcut," "New," and "Properties." The mouse cursor will change to indicate an active selection state.

precondition: A right-click context menu labeled 'Arrange Icons By' is open on the Windows XP desktop.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The "Appearance" tab will be selected, displaying options to customize the visual style of windows and buttons.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Themes" tab active.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will transition to the "Screen Saver" tab. A static Windows XP logo image will replace the interactive theme preview, and screen saver settings will replace theme-related controls.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu displays 'Windows XP'.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu and select 'None'.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will display 'None'.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is open, and the "None" option is selected.
action: Click on the "3D FlowerBox" item in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu will close. The "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will become active. A "Wait:" spin box will appear set to "10". An unchecked "On resume, password protect" checkbox will appear.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu should display '(None)' and the mouse cursor should be hovering over the 'Apply' button.
expected_results: The changes to the screen saver settings will be applied and the mouse cursor will move from the 'Apply' button to the 'Power...' button.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the button labeled "Power..." at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active. The 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu should display 'After 20 mins'.
action: Click the 'Turn off hard disks' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options.

precondition: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu in the "Power Options Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "After 5 hours" option in the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, and the "Turn off hard disks" option will be set to "After 5 hours".

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open with the 'OK' button visible.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will close.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'OK' button is highlighted.
